title: Alpe d’Huez Showdown: Vollering Wins the Battle, but Niewiadoma Claims Tour de France Femmes Victory by 4 Seconds
content:
Stunning Tour de France Femmes finale: Race leader Niewiadoma hangs on by 4 seconds as Vollering dominates Alpe d’Huez but cannot close the gap.

Read the full article at Alpe d’Huez Showdown: Vollering Wins the Battle, but Niewiadoma Claims Tour de France Femmes Victory by 4 Seconds on Velo.
author: sstokes
